title: Mechanisms of photoisomerization of the prenylated flavin mononucleotide cofactor: a theoretical study
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20061-20072
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02035A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Pannipa Panajapo, Phorntep Promma, Kritsana Sagarik
The enzymatic decarboxylation of α,β-unsaturated acids using the ferulic acid decarboxylase enzyme and prenylated flavin mononucleotide cofactor is a potential, environmentally friendly reaction for the biosynthesis of styrene and its derivatives.
